name: The Gentleman Approach
styles: 当代节奏布鲁斯 Contemporary R&B
intro: If you’ve been looking for some dope slow jamz to add to your collection, look no further. Indie Filipino artist Jeff Bernat just released his album “The Gentleman Approach” on iTunes. This album features smooth vocals, remastered tracks, and catchy melodies showing how less can be a helluva lot more.
